Um vulcão com o Plotly

```{r}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(z = ~volcano) %>%
  add_surface()
```

Um mapa

```{r}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = 174.768, lat = -36.852, popup = "Onde o R Nasceu")
```
